Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Duct leakage at joint connection. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 07/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
